description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Minigolf Mania is a 3D game with over 60 holes on 4 different courses.  It comes with four different games modes like Safari and Race mode, and many fun things including Booster Beams, Super Powers, Bouncy Surfaces, Lava, and more!
